name: Pei-Hua Weng
profileTexts: As a professional with 3.5 years of experience in web application development
I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality results, including  marketing websites, large-scale business ERP systems and casino web games
Professionally, I specialize in technologies such as TypeScript, Node.js, React, Astro, Next.js, Express, Vite, and other web development-related technologies.

Programming is a hobby for me, so I am eager to learn new technological knowledge and enjoy sharing what I've learned. I thrive on challenging development projects and look forward to collaborating with passionate and creative companies or teams.
